As part of our General Icon Pack, here are the 3D Sports Icon pack that you can download and easily edit in Figma. All the colors are editable with well-organized layers. There are 2 angles in Figma which makes it easy to use. You can use these icon sets for Sports apps, Kid related presentations, UI designs, and even educational purposes.


Here is a list of the icons in this set:

  • Dumbell x2
  • Dumbell Disk
  • Bowling Pin
  • Bowling Ball
  • Chess x2 (King and Queen)
  • Football
  • Table Tennis
  • Skateboard
  • Whistle
  • Tape Drinking Bottle
